Class HeuristicFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.common.map_heuristic.HeuristicFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeuristicFactoryImp

    public abstract class HeuristicFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    HeuristicFactory base class allows to create heuristic evaluators.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeuristic

        public abstract Heuristic getHeuristic(int heuristic,
                     AgentCommunication comm,
                     GroundedTask groundedTask,
                     PlannerFactory pf)
        Gets an heuristic evaluator.
        Parameters:
        heuristic - Heuristic function (see constants in this interface)
        comm - Communication utility
        groundedTask - Grounded task
        pf - Planner factory
        Returns:
        Heuristic evaluator
        Since:
        1.0

      • getHeuristicInfo

        public static java.lang.Object getHeuristicInfo(int heuristic,
                                int infoFlag)
        Retrieves information about a given heuristic function.
        Parameters:
        heuristic - Heuristic function (see constants in this interface)
        infoFlag - Topic to ask about. In this version, only INFO_USES_LANDMARKS and INFO_DISTRIBUTED are available
        Returns:
        Object with the equested information
        Since:
        1.0
